issue.title: [Java] JDBC-to-Arrow: JDBC Arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4142](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4142). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JDBC Adapter does not support JDBC Arrays.

JDBC Arrays can be walked using an internal ResultSet object, but its ResultSetMetaData may not contain the proper type information.  The sub-type information can be stored in the JdbcToArrowConfig object, because there may not be any other way to get it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4142?focusedCommentId=16772001) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I changed the issue state from "Closed" to "Resolved"
